dt: {bc}to form (three or more strands) into a braid
{bc}to do up (the hair) by interweaving three or more strands
{bc}to ornament especially with ribbon or braid

et: Middle English {it}breyden{/it} to move suddenly, snatch, plait, from Old English {it}bregdan{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}brettan{/it} to draw (a sword)
shortdef: to form (three or more strands) into a braid
to do up (the hair) by interweaving three or more strands
